HAD_PZ_pattern.description: Trainer HAD has negative relationship with Jockey PZ
HAD_PZ_pattern.content: Whenever Jockey PZ is riding horse trained by HAD, this combination will fail to win.

LKW_HCY_pattern.description: Trainer LKW has positive relationship with Jockey HCY
LKW_HCY_pattern.content: Jockey HCY has very good past performance with Trainer LKW, they perform very good in cooperation, they must get into Top 3 ranking in the horse race.
